docs.snippet: Health insurance tax credits, mandates, taxation of employer coverage, essential benefits. Mind-numbing health care jargon is flying around again as Republicans move to repeal and replace the Obama-era Affordable Care Act. It's time to start payin...
docs.lead_paragraph: Health insurance tax credits, mandates, taxation of employer coverage, essential benefits. Mind-numbing health care jargon is flying around again as Republicans move to repeal and replace the Obama-era Affordable Care Act. It's time to start paying attention.

docs.snippet: India's Tata Sons will split a dispute settlement payment of $1.18 billion owed to NTT DoCoMo over the Japanese firm's exit from a telecoms joint venture, leaving it with about two-thirds of the amount to invest in India, a source said....
docs.lead_paragraph: India's Tata Sons will split a dispute settlement payment of $1.18 billion owed to NTT DoCoMo over the Japanese firm's exit from a telecoms joint venture, leaving it with about two-thirds of the amount to invest in India, a source said.

docs.snippet: Attorney General Jeff Sessions has recused himself from an investigation into any ties between Moscow and President Donald Trump's 2016 campaign after revelations that he talked with Russia's ambassador to the United States twice during the presid...
docs.lead_paragraph: Attorney General Jeff Sessions has recused himself from an investigation into any ties between Moscow and President Donald Trump's 2016 campaign after revelations that he talked with Russia's ambassador to the United States twice during the presidential campaign. Sessions had faced mounting pressure from both parties on Capitol Hill that he step aside or resign.

headline.main: A Look at the Known Ties Between Trump Associates and Russia
headline.print_headline: A Look at the Known Ties Between Trump Associates and Russia
